main event: A ground visual observation of a round yellow object tinged with silver was reported over Canton, Ohio on 27 March 1956.
interesting points: The observed object was the size of a baseball held at arm's length,Estimated altitude of the object was 23 thousand feet,The sighting lasted two minutes,The object was reported to be stationary with no sound,The same object was seen previously in December 1954 and August 1955.
sighted object: one round yellow object tinged with silver
witness description: ground observer from the 4571 Ground Observation Squadron
